creator: jkf@apache.org
text:
Because of differences in line endings the checksum test cases fail on windows
XP. Converting the file expected file to platform file format before comparing
fixes this problem.

Alternative patch would involve changing the result to unix format, but with
different utilities to unpack the ant sources the expected file may be
translated in platform format.

Created attachment 13255
Patch to translate the expected result of the checksum test to platform format.
